title: Utilities
description: A collection of sub-schemas containing the controlled vocabularies and enumerated value lists for the Sinai Manuscripts Data Portal

features.$comment: TBD list of features | Could do a series of features based on context with a composition for groups?

forms.description: The original form of the manuscript object
forms.$comment: This enum is reused and expanded in #/$defs/state

idno_types.$comment: Use term 'shelfmark' for both real and digitally rebound manuscript objects

langs_all.description: All names available in the Sinai Manuscripts Data Portal, both ancient and modern

langs_ancient.description: Names of the ancient languages used in Sinai Manuscripts Data Portal

langs_modern.description: Names of the modern languages used in Sinai Manuscripts Data Portal

rel_con_source_types.$comment: Finalize enum | sources have associated scope, e.g. Syriaca for any entity but Pinakes only works and agents

scripts.description: Term list categorizing the writing system and script used in a given instance of writing
scripts.$comment: enum not complete. Will eventually be references to script records

states.description: The current state of the manuscript object
states.$comment: State allows the same enumerated value list as #/$defs/form with the addition of Undertext object
